story: Jon Snow was King for the House Targaryen and was also known in the whole kingdom as a ruler. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the freedom of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Margaery Tyrell to seek help. Margaery Tyrell was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. In Saltpans at the Autumnal Equinox ,Jon Snow met Daenerys Targaryen and they formed an alliance. At the Winter Solstice, Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen were almost in Karhold when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen celebrated in The Dreadfort by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a mass murderer. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened  the treasure of Arya Stark . Initially Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of King got stronger and learnt mind controlling. On the way to Red Keep at the Winter Solstice, Arya Stark met Sansa Stark and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark with the help of Sansa Stark finally found Petyr Baelish in The Twins. A bloody battle begun but Arya Stark thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. Eventually the castle was safe again. Arya Stark and Sansa Stark went to Bear Island and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a vigilante whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the freedom of Arya Stark. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Daenerys Targaryen to seek help. Daenerys Targaryen was a master of slowing Time and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Saltpans at the Winter Solstice, Arya Stark met Rickon Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Saltpans at the first day of Spring , Arya Stark faced Margaery Tyrell . With the help of Rickon Stark and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Margaery Tyrell . After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Arya Stark and Rickon Stark celebrated in Karhold by making fireworks.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as a murderer. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened  the peace of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish did not know what to do and went to Steffon Baratheon to seek help. Steffon Baratheon was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. In Raventree Hall at sunrise ,Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. Finally in Seagard at the Summer Solstice , Petyr Baelish faced Daenerys Targaryen . With the help of Lysa Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of gravity Control , the alliance scared away  Daenerys Targaryen . After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn celebrated in Raventree Hall by watching a play.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened  the jewel of Petyr Baelish . Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Bran Stark got stronger and learnt invisibility. During a long training session in The Trident at the Winter Solstice, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Robert Arryn finally found Robert Baratheon in Saltpans. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Robert Baratheon. Eventually the castle was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn went to The Dreadfort and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time, there was an assassin whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the treasure of Arya Stark. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Jon Snow to seek help. Jon Snow was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. In Moat Cailin at the first day of Spring ,Arya Stark met Bran Stark and they formed an alliance. At the Winter Solstice, Arya Stark and Bran Stark were almost in Moat Cailin when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Arya Stark used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the peace was safe again. Arya Stark and Bran Stark went to Great Sept of Baelor and celebrated by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Daenerys Targaryen, Princess from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a a ruler. Daenerys Targaryen was having an happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened  The House of Daenerys Targaryen . Initially Daenerys Targaryen was afraid, but with the help of Lyarra Stark got stronger and learnt gravity Control. In White Harbor at the Autumnal Equinox ,Daenerys Targaryen met Benjen Stark and they formed an alliance. At Night, Daenerys Targaryen and Benjen Stark were almost in Saltpans when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Benjen Stark celebrated in Kings Landing by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, there was a mass murderer whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the castle of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of Daenerys Targaryen got stronger and learnt teleportation. During a long training session in The Iron Island at Night, Arya Stark met Sansa Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Riverlands at the Winter Solstice , Arya Stark faced Daenerys Targaryen . With the help of Sansa Stark and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation , the alliance scared away  Daenerys Targaryen . This is how Arya Stark managed to save the beloved the peace. In The Vale of Arryn celebrated with  Sansa Stark by getting married .

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened The House of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Loras Tyrell got stronger and learnt invisibility. During a long training session in Kings Landing at the first day of Spring, Bran Stark met Robb Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Summer Solstice, Bran Stark and Robb Stark were almost in Karhold when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the beloved the freedom. In White Harbor celebrated with  Robb Stark by listening to a storytelling .

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a an influencer. The evil Bran Stark one day posed a threat to the freedom of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Petyr Baelish got stronger and learnt teleportation. During a long training session in The Trident at Christmas, Margaery Tyrell met Alerie Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Alerie Tyrell finally found Bran Stark in Oldstones. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Bran Stark. After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Alerie Tyrell celebrated in Winterfell by organizing a concert.

story: Daenerys Targaryen was Princess for the House Targaryen and was also known in the whole kingdom as a ruler. Daenerys Targaryen was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened  the jewel of Daenerys Targaryen . Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Joanna Lannister to seek help. Joanna Lannister was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Deepwood Motte at Night, Daenerys Targaryen met Rhaella Targaryen and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Daenerys Targaryen with the help of Rhaella Targaryen finally found Bran Stark in The Iron Island. A bloody battle begun but Daenerys Targaryen thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Bran Stark. This is how Daenerys Targaryen managed to save the beloved The House. In Great Sept of Baelor celebrated with  Rhaella Targaryen by organizing a concert .

story: Daenerys Targaryen was Princess for the House Targaryen and was also known in the whole kingdom as a ruler. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened The House of Daenerys Targaryen. Initially Daenerys Targaryen was afraid, but with the help of Tommen Baratheon got stronger and learnt military strategy. During a long training session in White Harbor at the Autumnal Equinox, Daenerys Targaryen met Aegon Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Winter Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen and Aegon Targaryen were almost in Great Sept of Baelor when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Daenerys Targaryen managed to save the beloved The House. In Red Keep celebrated with  Aegon Targaryen by making fireworks .

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as a revolutionary. Everything was quiet when one day Jon Snow threatened the treasure of Tyrion Lannister. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Viserys Targaryen, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of slowing Time. On the way to White Harbor at Night, Tyrion Lannister met Tywin Lannister and they immediately became friends. Finally in Bear Island at the Summer Solstice , Tyrion Lannister faced Jon Snow . With the help of Tywin Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Jon Snow . After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Tywin Lannister celebrated in Winterfell by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a mass murderer whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the treasure of Arya Stark. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Rhaenys Targaryen, Arya Stark learnt the power of military strategy. On the way to Raventree Hall at the Winter Solstice, Arya Stark met Rickon Stark and they immediately became friends. At the Winter Solstice, Arya Stark and Rickon Stark were almost in The Whispering Wood when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Arya Stark used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Arya Stark and Rickon Stark went to Riverlands and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time, there was an advisor whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the peace of Tyrion Lannister. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Robert Arryn, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of military strategy. During a long training session in Seagard at the Winter Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Jaime Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Ruby Ford at Night , Tyrion Lannister faced Petyr Baelish . With the help of Jaime Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Petyr Baelish . This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the beloved the treasure. In Kings Landing celebrated with  Jaime Lannister by playing a game .

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as a procurer. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened  The House of Petyr Baelish . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Rhaenys Targaryen, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of military strategy. In Oldstones at the Autumnal Equinox ,Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Lysa Arryn finally found Cersei Lannister in Riverlands. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Cersei Lannister. Eventually the treasure was safe again. story: Once upon a time, there was an assassin whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened  the peace of Arya Stark . Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Robert Baratheon to seek help. Robert Baratheon was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Raventree Hall at the Summer Solstice, Arya Stark met Bran Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Great Sept of Baelor at the Summer Solstice , Arya Stark faced Jon Snow . With the help of Bran Stark and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Jon Snow . This is how Arya Stark managed to save the beloved the treasure. In The Vale of Arryn celebrated with  Bran Stark by  having a feast .

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. The evil Jon Snow one day posed a threat to The House of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Bran Stark got stronger and learnt invisibility. During a long training session in Red Keep at the Autumnal Equinox, Bran Stark met Robb Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Oldstones at the Winter Solstice , Bran Stark faced Jon Snow . With the help of Robb Stark and thanks to the learnt power of invisibility , the alliance scared away  Jon Snow . This is how Bran Stark managed to save the beloved the treasure. In Saltpans celebrated with  Robb Stark by organizing a concert .

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. The evil Robert Baratheon one day posed a threat to the freedom of Bran Stark. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Myrcella Baratheon, Bran Stark learnt the power of invisibility. During a long training session in Castle Black at Night, Bran Stark met Arya Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Christmas, Bran Stark and Arya Stark were almost in The Vale of Arryn when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Bran Stark and Arya Stark celebrated in Saltpans by getting married.

story: Robert Baratheon was King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a revolutionary. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the freedom of Robert Baratheon. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Cassana Baratheon, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of teleportation. On the way to The Ruby Ford at Night, Robert Baratheon met Renly Baratheon and they immediately became friends. Finally in Bear Island at Night , Robert Baratheon faced Tyrion Lannister . With the help of Renly Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation , the alliance scared away  Tyrion Lannister . Eventually the freedom was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Renly Baratheon went to The Iron Island and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: Jon Snow was King for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a ruler. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the peace of Jon Snow. Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Hizdahr zo Loraq got stronger and learnt military strategy. In Oldstones at sunrise ,Jon Snow met Aegon Targaryen and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Aegon Targaryen finally found Margaery Tyrell in Bear Island. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Margaery Tyrell. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Jon Snow and Aegon Targaryen went to Castle Black and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Arya Stark was Lady for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a vigilante. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the peace of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of Lyarra Stark got stronger and learnt gravity Control. In Castle Black at the Winter Solstice ,Arya Stark met Rickon Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark with the help of Rickon Stark finally found Tyrion Lannister in Deepwood Motte. A bloody battle begun but Arya Stark thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Arya Stark and Rickon Stark went to Bear Island and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the treasure of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Daario Naharis got stronger and learnt gravity Control. During a long training session in Moat Cailin at sunrise, Bran Stark met Catelyn Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Catelyn Stark finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Saltpans. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the beloved the treasure. In Riverlands celebrated with  Catelyn Stark by organizing a concert .

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the peace of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Rhaegar Targaryen to seek help. Rhaegar Targaryen was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in The Dreadfort at the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Garlan Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Garlan Tyrell finally found Petyr Baelish in The Trident. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the beloved The House. In Torrhen's Square celebrated with  Garlan Tyrell by watching a play .

story: Once upon a time, there was a soldier whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the freedom of Jon Snow. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Ygritte, Jon Snow learnt the power of military strategy. During a long training session in The Trident at Christmas, Jon Snow met Ygritte. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Deepwood Motte at sunrise , Jon Snow faced Bran Stark . With the help of Ygritte and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Bran Stark . After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Ygritte celebrated in Oldstones by listening to a storytelling.

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a prophet. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the treasure of Bran Stark. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Tywin Lannister, Bran Stark learnt the power of invisibility. On the way to The Dreadfort at the Autumnal Equinox, Bran Stark met Eddard Stark and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Eddard Stark finally found Petyr Baelish in The Dreadfort. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Bran Stark and Eddard Stark went to The Trident and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the castle of Daenerys Targaryen. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Euron Greyjoy, Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of invisibility. In Castle Black at sunrise ,Daenerys Targaryen met Aerys II Targaryen and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Daenerys Targaryen with the help of Aerys II Targaryen finally found Tyrion Lannister in Kings Landing. A bloody battle begun but Daenerys Targaryen thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Aerys II Targaryen celebrated in Kings Landing by  having a feast.

story: A long time ago Robert Baratheon, Lord from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a a military leader. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the castle of Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon did not know what to do and went to Hizdahr zo Loraq to seek help. Hizdahr zo Loraq was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Eyrie at Christmas ,Robert Baratheon met Gendry and they formed an alliance. At sunrise, Robert Baratheon and Gendry were almost in The Whispering Wood when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Robert Baratheon and Gendry celebrated in The Eyrie by playing a game.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the treasure of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Catelyn Stark got stronger and learnt gravity Control. On the way to Bear Island at Night, Bran Stark met Arya Stark and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Arya Stark finally found Tyrion Lannister in Bear Island. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Bran Stark and Arya Stark celebrated in Raventree Hall by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened  the treasure of Daenerys Targaryen . Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Steffon Baratheon to seek help. Steffon Baratheon was a master of slowing Time and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Twins at Christmas ,Daenerys Targaryen met Rhaegar Targaryen and they formed an alliance. Finally in The Twins at the Summer Solstice , Daenerys Targaryen faced Petyr Baelish . With the help of Rhaegar Targaryen and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Petyr Baelish . Eventually The House was safe again. Daenerys Targaryen and Rhaegar Targaryen went to Great Sept of Baelor and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a a bureaucrat. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened  the jewel of Petyr Baelish . Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Alerie Tyrell got stronger and learnt slowing Time. In The Iron Island at Night ,Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Lysa Arryn finally found Daenerys Targaryen in The Twins. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to slowing Time powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. After the victory, the freedom was not under treat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn celebrated in Moat Cailin by getting married.

story: A long time ago Tyrion Lannister, Lord from the House Lannister, was known to be very good as a a murderer. The evil Bran Stark one day posed a threat to the treasure of Tyrion Lannister. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Cassana Baratheon, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of teleportation. In Crossroads Inn at the Autumnal Equinox ,Tyrion Lannister met Shae and they formed an alliance. Finally in Moat Cailin at the Winter Solstice , Tyrion Lannister faced Bran Stark . With the help of Shae and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation , the alliance scared away  Bran Stark . Eventually The House was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Shae went to Kings Landing and celebrated by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a an assassin. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the treasure of Arya Stark. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Jon Snow, Arya Stark learnt the power of teleportation. During a long training session in The Twins at the Winter Solstice, Arya Stark met Eddard Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Summer Solstice, Arya Stark and Eddard Stark were almost in The Whispering Wood when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Arya Stark used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Arya Stark and Eddard Stark celebrated in The Ruby Ford by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a murderer whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Tyrell. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the treasure of Petyr Baelish. Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Sansa Stark got stronger and learnt mind controlling. In The Vale of Arryn at the Autumnal Equinox ,Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. At sunrise, Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn were almost in Deepwood Motte when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the castle was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn went to Karhold and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Jon Snow was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a squire. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened  The House of Jon Snow . Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Lord got stronger and learnt invisibility. In The Whispering Wood at the Winter Solstice ,Jon Snow met Rhaenys Targaryen and they formed an alliance. At the Autumnal Equinox, Jon Snow and Rhaenys Targaryen were almost in Seagard when they realized Tyrion Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Jon Snow and Rhaenys Targaryen went to The Whispering Wood and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a an influencer. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the castle of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Khal Drogo got stronger and learnt military strategy. On the way to White Harbor at the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Mace Tyrell and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Mace Tyrell finally found Bran Stark in The Ruby Ford. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Bran Stark. Eventually The House was safe again. Margaery Tyrell and Mace Tyrell went to The Twins and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened The House of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Cassana Baratheon to seek help. Cassana Baratheon was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. In Great Sept of Baelor at the Winter Solstice ,Bran Stark met Eddard Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in Red Keep at the Summer Solstice , Bran Stark faced Daenerys Targaryen . With the help of Eddard Stark and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling , the alliance scared away  Daenerys Targaryen . After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Bran Stark and Eddard Stark celebrated in Kings Landing by watching a play.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as a bureaucrat. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened The House of Tyrion Lannister. Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Lancel Lannister got stronger and learnt mind controlling. On the way to Deepwood Motte at the Autumnal Equinox, Tyrion Lannister met Shae and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Tyrion Lannister with the help of Shae finally found Margaery Tyrell in Riverlands. A bloody battle begun but Tyrion Lannister thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Margaery Tyrell. Eventually the castle was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Shae went to Moat Cailin and celebrated by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, there was a mass murderer whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen regnant from the House Lannister. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the castle of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Rickon Stark to seek help. Rickon Stark was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Iron Island at Christmas ,Cersei Lannister met Jaime Lannister and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Cersei Lannister with the help of Jaime Lannister finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Crossroads Inn. A bloody battle begun but Cersei Lannister thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. This is how Cersei Lannister managed to save the beloved the peace. In The Twins celebrated with  Jaime Lannister by getting married .

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened  The House of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Aegon Targaryen to seek help. Aegon Targaryen was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Twins at the first day of Spring, Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister and they immediately became friends. Finally in Crossroads Inn at the Winter Solstice , Tyrion Lannister faced Bran Stark . With the help of Joanna Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation , the alliance scared away  Bran Stark . After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Joanna Lannister celebrated in Deepwood Motte by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a an advisor. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened The House of Petyr Baelish. Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Garlan Tyrell got stronger and learnt slowing Time. In Oldstones at the Winter Solstice ,Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. At the Autumnal Equinox, Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn were almost in The Eyrie when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used slowing Time forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn celebrated in Seagard by playing a game.

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a an influencer. The evil Robert Baratheon one day posed a threat to the freedom of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Hizdahr zo Loraq got stronger and learnt military strategy. On the way to Karhold at the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Tommen Baratheon and they immediately became friends. Finally in White Harbor at the Summer Solstice , Margaery Tyrell faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Tommen Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the beloved The House. In Seagard celebrated with  Tommen Baratheon by playing a game .

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a Lord from the House Baratheon. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the jewel of Robert Baratheon. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Hizdahr zo Loraq, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of fire sorcery. In The Ruby Ford at the Winter Solstice ,Robert Baratheon met Cassana Baratheon and they formed an alliance. At the Winter Solstice, Robert Baratheon and Cassana Baratheon were almost in Castle Black when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the peace was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Cassana Baratheon went to Bear Island and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a mass murderer whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened  the freedom of Arya Stark . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Alerie Tyrell, Arya Stark learnt the power of mind controlling. In Kings Landing at the first day of Spring ,Arya Stark met Eddard Stark and they formed an alliance. At Christmas, Arya Stark and Eddard Stark were almost in Karhold when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Arya Stark used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Arya Stark and Eddard Stark celebrated in Seagard by getting married.

story: A long time ago Tyrion Lannister, Lord from the House Lannister, was known to be very good as a a revolutionary. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the treasure of Tyrion Lannister. Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Eddard Stark got stronger and learnt gravity Control. In The Eyrie at sunrise ,Tyrion Lannister met Lancel Lannister and they formed an alliance. Finally in The Vale of Arryn at sunrise , Tyrion Lannister faced Petyr Baelish . With the help of Lancel Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of gravity Control , the alliance scared away  Petyr Baelish . Eventually The House was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Lancel Lannister went to Seagard and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened  the freedom of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish did not know what to do and went to Robb Stark to seek help. Robb Stark was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Eyrie at the Winter Solstice ,Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. At the first day of Spring, Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn were almost in The Iron Island when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the peace was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn went to Oldstones and celebrated by getting married.

story: Arya Stark was Lady for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as an assassin. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the peace of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of Hizdahr zo Loraq got stronger and learnt invisibility. In Seagard at sunrise ,Arya Stark met Bran Stark and they formed an alliance. At Christmas, Arya Stark and Bran Stark were almost in Crossroads Inn when they realized Tyrion Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Arya Stark used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Arya Stark managed to save the beloved the peace. In Crossroads Inn celebrated with  Bran Stark by making fireworks .

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the treasure of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Daenerys Targaryen to seek help. Daenerys Targaryen was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in White Harbor at Night, Daenerys Targaryen met Hizdahr zo Loraq. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the first day of Spring, Daenerys Targaryen and Hizdahr zo Loraq were almost in Great Sept of Baelor when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Daenerys Targaryen and Hizdahr zo Loraq went to Kings Landing and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened the peace of Bran Stark. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Robert Baratheon, Bran Stark learnt the power of military strategy. During a long training session in Saltpans at Christmas, Bran Stark met Robb Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Crossroads Inn at the Summer Solstice , Bran Stark faced Margaery Tyrell . With the help of Robb Stark and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Margaery Tyrell . After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Bran Stark and Robb Stark celebrated in Oldstones by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened  the peace of Daenerys Targaryen . Initially Daenerys Targaryen was afraid, but with the help of Joanna Lannister got stronger and learnt invisibility. On the way to Oldstones at the Autumnal Equinox, Daenerys Targaryen met Lyanna Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in Seagard at the Summer Solstice , Daenerys Targaryen faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Lyanna Stark and thanks to the learnt power of invisibility , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . This is how Daenerys Targaryen managed to save the beloved the peace. In Moat Cailin celebrated with  Lyanna Stark by listening to a storytelling .
